docs.lead_paragraph: Corrections appearing in print on Thursday, July 30, 2015.
docs.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on Thursday, July 30, 2015.

headline.print_headline: Legionnaires’ Disease Kills 2 in the Bronx
headline.main: Legionnaires’ Disease Sickens 31, 2 Fatally, in the South Bronx

docs.abstract: At least 31 people in South Bronx are stricken with Legionnaires' Disease, which is commonly spread via water mist, and two people die; several apartment building cooling towers in area are found to contain bacteria.
docs.lead_paragraph: The outbreak of the disease, the largest New York City has seen in at least two years, has flared up in the neighborhoods of Highbridge, Morrisania, Mott Haven and Hunts Point since July 10.
docs.snippet: The outbreak of the disease, the largest New York City has seen in at least two years, has flared up in the neighborhoods of Highbridge, Morrisania, Mott Haven and Hunts Point since July 10.

headline.print_headline: Jules Hirsch, Pioneer in Obesity Studies, Is Dead at 88
headline.main: Jules Hirsch, Pioneer in Obesity Studies, Is Dead at 88

docs.abstract: Jules Hirsch, pioneer in research on metabolism whose work served as foundation for obesity studies, dies at age 88.
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Hirsch found evidence that weight is at least partly determined by the body’s own processes.
docs.snippet: Dr. Hirsch found evidence that weight is at least partly determined by the body’s own processes.

headline.print_headline: Bike and Foot Route to Ease Bronx Residents’ Trip to Randalls Island
headline.main: Connector Between Randalls Island and Bronx Is to Open This Summer

docs.abstract: South Bronx residents look forward to imminent opening of Randalls Island Connector, pedestrian and bike bridge between neighborhood and recreational areas of Randalls Island; Bronx is closest borough to island, separated only by narrow waterway, but has never had convenient access before.
docs.lead_paragraph: The long-awaited pedestrian and bike route will link the island to the Port Morris neighborhood, giving borough residents easier access to the island’s playing fields, bike trails and nature areas.
docs.snippet: The long-awaited pedestrian and bike route will link the island to the Port Morris neighborhood, giving borough residents easier access to the island’s playing fields, bike trails and nature areas.
